Definitions

Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=架,嘎}}
Two theories:
* From the common {{der|yue|ja|-}} particle {{ja-r|か}}.
* From the second syllable of {{der|yue|ja|-}} {{ja-r|馬鹿|ばか|fool; idiot}}, used by Japanese soldiers during the Sino–Japanese War.
